code: import axios from'axios';export var apiSaveExpense=function apiSaveExpense(expense){return axios.post('/api/v1/expense',expense);};export var apiUpdateExpense=function apiUpdateExpense(expense){return axios.put("/api/v1/expense/".concat(expense._id),expense);};export var apiDeleteExpense=function apiDeleteExpense(expenseId){return axios.delete("/api/v1/expense/".concat(expenseId));};export var apiFetchExpense=function apiFetchExpense(url){return axios.get(url);};
